meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Will Anderson Erin Rhode Daniel Grigg Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6988.

td.p: Will Anderson, a senior legislative aide originally from Atlanta, Georgia
Erin Rhode, a software engineer originally from Plymouth, Minnesota
Daniel Grigg, a beer wholesaler from Colorado Springs, Colorado (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,000)

tr.td: WHAT'S MY LINE?
FRUITY MUSIC
DANGEROUS WEATHER
FRENCH DIP
THE INTERNET
SWIFT MYTH
